traditional: 簡便
jiǎnbiàn simple and convenient; handy
bōxíng waveform

běndi local
běndì local; this locality
zhènfú amplitude
xīqǔ to absorb; to draw [a lesson or an insight]; to assimilate
wēixiào smile

traditional: 手續
shǒuxù formalities
liúxíng to spread; to rage (of contagious disease); popular; fashionable; prevalent; (math.) manifold

traditional: 快樂
kuàilè happy; merry

traditional: 和氣
héqi friendly; polite; amiable
gùyǒu (v) be intrinsic or inherent to sth
gōngfēn centimeter; gram

traditional: 中國人民
Zhōngguórénmín the Chinese people
zhōngguórénmín Chinese people
yīdù for a time; at one time; one time; once
xuāngào declare; proclaim

traditional: 閃電
shǎndiàn lightning
qìxiè special or precision equipment; apparatus

traditional: 抗戰
kàngzhàn war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)

traditional: 對抗
duìkàng withstand; resist; confrontation

traditional: 編輯
biānjí edit; compile; (assistant) editor; compiler
